actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a special postage stamp in commemoration of the life and work of Jeannette Rankin.

summary.text: Authorizes the issuance of a special postage stamp in commemoration of the life and work of Jeannette Rankin, the first woman to be elected to the House of Representatives.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a special postage stamp in commemoration of the life and work of Jeannette Rankin.
